sense.gloss: to cross over, to go across
to extend, to cover, to range, to span
third month of the lunar calendar
Yayoi period (ca. 300 BCE-300 CE), Yayoi culture
ghostleg lottery, ladder lottery, lottery in which participants trace a line across a lattice pattern to determine the winner
x: 阿弥陀籤・あみだくじ

sense.gloss: wearing a hat pushed back on one's head
x: 阿弥陀被り・あみだかぶり

sense.gloss: Namu Amida Butsu, Hail Amitabha Buddha, Homage to Amida Buddha, prayer for rebirth in Sukhavati, the Pure Land of Amitabha
ending up right back where one started
to jeer (at), to hoot, to boo, to catcall, to heckle

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓の↑名↑↓な↓は↑弥太郎↑↓やたろう↓です。
ここで↑中断↑↓ちゅうだん↓したら↑元↑↓もと↓の↑木阿弥↑↓もくあみ↓だぞっ。
sdata.e: If we stop here, we'll be right back where we started!

sdata.j: もー、↑弥生↑↓やよい↓のナビが↑判↑↓わか↓りにくいから、↑同↑↓おな↓じトコぐるぐる↑回↑↓まわ↓ったじゃない。
sdata.e: Hmph, Yayoi's navigation was difficult to follow so we ended up going round and round the same places.

sdata.j: ↑僕↑↓ぼく↓が↑昼飯↑↓ひるめし↓を↑喰↑↓く↓っている↑時↑↓とき↓、↑吉弥↑↓よしや↓は↑僕↑↓ぼく↓のところへやって↑来↑↓き↓て、↑飯↑↓めし↓の↑給仕↑↓きゅうじ↓をしてくれながら↑太↑↓ふと↓い↑指↑↓ゆび↓にきらめいている↑宝石↑↓ほうせき↓↑入↑↓い↓りの↑指輪↑↓ゆびわ↓を↑嬉↑↓うれ↓しそうにいじくっていた。
sdata.e: As I was eating lunch, Kichiya came to me and, while she was serving my meal, she was toying happily with her ring set with a gleaming jewel.

words.gloss: to cross over, to go across
third month of the lunar calendar
